item.description:
Laugh, connect, meet, hang out, enjoy the food, meet that 'special someone' (you never know...) or a business connection or a kayaking buddy or just have a great and interesting conversation with someone you may never have met otherwise.

We love to support our local farmers and chefs and artists so we are purposely choosing restaurants that have made a name for themselves by using fresh, healthy local ingredients and who are doing innovative things with food. If you have any suggestions, we are open!
item.how_to_find_us: we will be the largest table!
item.name: Eat-Up! June Meetup at the Side Street Cafe!
